BOOLEAN AbstractLockableDevice::Lock (   )  [virtual]
 

Locks an device for exclusive using

Returns:
TRUE if locking was successful, FALSE if device is locked by another application

BOOLEAN AbstractLockableDevice::Unlock (   )  [virtual]
 

Unlocks a previously locked device

Returns:
TRUE if unlocking was successful, FALSE if not
